column4: I have an .avi video that I'm trying to upload to facebook, but its too large to upload (its like 717.4 MB). How would I shrink this to 300 MB or less?
heh. that's huge. i'm amazed that facebook allows that
have you ever been able to open one? you may be missing some libs
well I've been able to play some movies that I... completely legally aquired... that are in .avi format, so I don't know what the issue is with the videos I'm trying to shrink now...
